https://openminds.om-i.org/props/additio._instruction: Enter any additional remarks concerning this recording.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/additio.description: Mention of what deserves additional attention or notice.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/additio.label: Additional remarks
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/additio.name: additionalRemarks

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/channel._instruction: Enter all channels used for this recording.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/channel.label: Channel
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/channel.name: channel

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/dataLoc._instruction: Add the location of the file or file bundle in which the recorded data is stored.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/dataLoc.label: Data location
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/dataLoc.name: dataLocation

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/interna._instruction: Enter the identifier (or label) of this recording that is used within the corresponding data files to identify this recording.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/interna.description: Term or code that identifies someone or something within a particular product.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/interna.label: Internal identifier
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/interna.name: internalIdentifier

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name._instruction: Enter a descriptive name for this recording.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.label: Name
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.name: name

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/previou._instruction: If this recording is part of a sequence of recordings (e.g., multiple repetitions or sweeps), add the recording preceding this recording.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/previou.label: Previous recording
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/previou.name: previousRecording

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/recorde._instruction: Add the device used to generate this recording.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/recorde.label: Recorded with
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/recorde.name: recordedWith

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/samplin._instruction: Enter the sampling frequency of this recording.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/samplin.label: Sampling frequency
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/samplin.name: samplingFrequency
